CSSPageRuleStyle.summary:
The style read-only property of the interface returns a object.
This represents a CSS declaration block for a CSS @page at-rule, and exposes style information and various style-related methods and properties for the page.
CSSPageRuleStyle.value:
A object with properties that match the associated {{cssxref("@page")}} at-rule.
NOTEEarlier versions of the specification defined this property as a .
Check the compatibility data below for your browser.
